sn45.41:1.2: “Sace vo, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ:
sn45.41:1.3: ‘kimatthiyaṃ, āvuso, samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti, evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyātha:
sn45.41:1.5: Sace pana vo, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ:
sn45.41:1.6: ‘atthi panāvuso, maggo, atthi paṭipadā rāgavirāgāyā’ti, evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyātha:
sn45.41:1.7: ‘atthi kho, āvuso, maggo, atthi paṭipadā rāgavirāgāyā’ti.
sn45.41:1.8: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, maggo, katamā ca paṭipadā rāgavirāgāya?
sn45.41:1.11: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo, ayaṃ paṭipadā rāgavirāgāyāti.
sn45.41:1.12: Evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyāthā”ti.
